headline: Netflix Faces Warner Bros. Discovery Battle And Valuation Questions
summary: Netflix (NasdaqGS:NFLX) has made an US$82.7b bid to acquire Warner Bros. Discovery, triggering a takeover contest. Paramount Skydance has submitted a rival all cash offer that includes a ticking fee and breakup fee coverage. Activist investor Ancora Holdings has built a large stake in Warner Bros. Discovery and is urging shareholders to back Paramount Skydance's proposal over Netflix's. The U.S. Department of Justice has opened an antitrust investigation into Netflix focused on potential...

headline: Loomis Sayles Global Growth Fund Maintains Its Structural Investment Thesis for Netflix (NFLX). Here’s Why
summary: Loomis Sayles, an investment management company, released its “Global Growth Fund” investor letter for the fourth quarter of 2025. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. The Fund prioritizes investments in high-quality companies that possess a lasting competitive advantage and long-term growth drivers, capable of generating attractive cash flow and sustained value for […]
